import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Booking.css' import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button} from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} =tour const navigate = useNavigate() const[credentials,setCredentials]= useState({ userId : "01", userEmail:"example@gmail.com", fullName:"", phone:"", guestSize:1, bookAt:"", }) const handleChange = e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const serviceFee = 5 const totalAmmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize)+Number(serviceFee) const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault() // console.log(credentials) navigate('/thankyou') } // handleClick() return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating ===0 ? null :avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service Charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmmount}
) }
